# Background



# Load Libraries
```{r libraries, message=FALSE}
#load libraries ----
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(reactable)
library(crosstalk)
library(DT)
library(d3scatter)
```

# Load Dataset
```{r dataset, message=FALSE}
#define dataset ----
mtcars2 <- mtcars %>% tibble::rownames_to_column("mfr")
shared_mtcars <- SharedData$new(mtcars2)
```

# Setup Crosstalk
```{r, crosstalk1, eval=FALSE}
#setup crosstalk widgets ----
bscols(widths = c(3,6,9),
       list(
         filter_checkbox("cyl", "Cylinders", shared_mtcars, ~cyl, inline = TRUE),
         filter_slider("hp", "Horsepower", shared_mtcars, ~hp, width = "100%"),
         filter_select("mfr", "Manufacturer", shared_mtcars, ~unique(mtcars2$mfr)),
         filter_select("auto", "Automatic", shared_mtcars, ~ifelse(am == 0, "Yes", "No"))
       ),
       list(
        d3scatter(shared_mtcars, ~wt, ~mpg, ~factor(cyl), width="100%", height=200),
        d3scatter(shared_mtcars, ~hp, ~qsec, ~factor(cyl), width="100%", height=200)
       ),
       reactable(shared_mtcars, searchable = TRUE, minRows = 3, defaultPageSize = 5,
                 resizable = TRUE, 
                 highlight = TRUE, 
                 selection = "multiple")
       # DT::datatable(shared_mtcars)
)
```
